Company registration in the USA

Open a company in the USA to work on Amazon, Shopify, Etsy, eBay.

Registration of a company in the USA gives you an opportunity to

Work securely

Business in the USA is one of the most secured in the world.

Get a work visa

Having a company in the USA, you can visit the country for your purposes.

Enter new trade markets

You can trade on Amazon, eBay, Shopify, Etsy, Walmart, and other platforms, as well as sell on your website via payment systems.

Work with investors

Issue stocks, sell intellectual and physical property rights.

Registration of a company for a citizen of any country

  • Opening a company for any citizen in the state of Georgia;

  • Provision of a legal address or P.O. for correspondence;

  • Assistance and representation of the interests while working with banks, tax office, and Amazon;

  • Assistance with Sales Tax ID numbers and Resale Certificate;

  • Free consultations on taxes and immigration laws as well as on immigration assistance and green cards;

  • Full accounting support and representation of the interests in the IRS;

  • One of the lowest corporate taxes in the USA;

  • Opportunity to get a corporation bank card for you and your employees;

  • Russian-speaking accountant and tax support;

  • Opportunity to get Utility Bills;

  • Assistance in opening a PayPal account, as well as on trading platforms.

Get started

It will take you less than sixty seconds. A member of our team will contact you shortly after.

FAQ

What taxes does the corporation have?

— Sales Tax (Georgia state sales tax): 6% at a legal address free of charge for our customers. The rate varies from 4% to 8.9% in the state.

— Income Tax (Income Tax is calculated on an annual basis): 6% in the state of Georgia + federal tax (21%).

Do we help to reduce taxes paid?

Yes. But it will be necessary to talk to you in person.

Can i open an account for a corporation in the american bank?

Yes, you can. But only with a personal visit to a bank branch in the USA or with a power of attorney. We will consult you on obtaining a tourist/business visa. We are also ready to accompany you to the bank branch and represent the interests as well as provide you with translation.

Does opening a company help to immigrate to the USA?

Opening a company in the USA in no way helps to immigrate to the USA. There are many programs (visas) for different specialists, people from different countries with different financial capabilities and goals.

Do we help to open an account on Payoneer, Amazon, eBay, etc?

Yes, we do.

If you need more than what we are listing here please contact us directly so we can take the best of your work together.
